plongez-dans-une-aventure-musicale-fasci: Dive into a fascinating musical adventure and explore cultures from all over the world together. Share unique moments as you discover transcendent sounds and cultures that will make you dance and dream.
la-musique-a-le-pouvoir-de-transcender-l: Music has the power to transcend borders. We're committed to providing an inclusive platform where everyone can explore, share, and celebrate the world's musical diversity.
faire-des-karaokes: Have a blast with karaoke sessions
nous-croyons-que-la-musique-a-le-pouvoir: We believe that music has the power to introduce people to different cultures. Our mission is to offer a platform where every user can discover and appreciate the richness of music from all over the world
creer-un-espace-ou-toutes-les-voix-et-to: - CREATE a space where all voices and all types of music are valued.
permettre-a-chacun-ou-quil-soit-de-decou: - ENABLE everyone, wherever they are, to discover music.
eclairer-tout-un-chacun-sur-la-diversite: - ENLIGHTEN everyone to the diversity of the world's traditions.
favoriser-les-echanges-et-le-partage-de-: - PROMOTE the exchange and sharing of cultures and sounds.
rejoignez-notre-communaute-et-participez: Join our community and take part in our mission to celebrate musical diversity. Whether you're a music lover, a musician or simply curious, we have something to offer you. Together, let's make music a universal language of peace and unity.
etes-vous-sur-e-de-vouloir-creer-un-comp: Are you sure you want to create an account with this information?
deja-un-compte-connectez-vous: Already have an account? Sign in
pas-denregistrement-retournez-a-la-page-: No recording. Go back to the previous page and record something.
pas-de-chanson-trouvee-en-lien-avec-les-: No songs found matching the selected filters.
un-email-a-ete-envoye-a-ladresse: An email has been sent to the address

messages.1-1: Hello everyone! Before you start participating, please read the forum rules carefully to ensure a pleasant experience for everyone. Thank you!
messages.1-2: Remember to be respectful and courteous in your exchanges. Any violation of the rules will be sanctioned.
messages.2-1: Do you have a question about how the forum works? Check our FAQ to quickly find answers.
messages.2-2: If your question is not in the FAQ, feel free to ask it here and our community will be happy to help.
messages.3-1: New! Discover the latest site updates in this section. Your feedback is valuable to us.
messages.3-2: Stay informed about new features and important announcements by following this thread.
messages.4-1: Are you experiencing technical problems? Report them here so our team can resolve them quickly.
messages.4-2: We are always listening to your suggestions to improve the site. Share your ideas in this section.
messages.5-1: What are your thoughts on the new albums released this week? Share your opinions and favorite tracks.
messages.5-2: Have you discovered a new song or artist? Share your discoveries here.
messages.6-1: Looking for music recommendations? Indicate your favorite genres and we will suggest some gems.
messages.6-2: Share your constructive reviews on the latest albums or concerts you have attended.
messages.7-1: Let's discuss the major musical movements that have marked history. What is your favorite movement and why?
messages.7-2: Do you have interesting anecdotes about artists or historical musical events? Share them here.
messages.8-1: Which festivals are you planning to attend this summer? Share your plans and expectations.
messages.8-2: Have you recently attended a concert? Tell us about your experience and memorable moments.
messages.9-1: Are you a musician or composer? Share your creations with the community and get constructive feedback.
messages.9-2: Discover the works of other forum members and support their talents by leaving comments.
messages.10-1: Want to discuss something other than music? This section is dedicated to your various and varied topics.
messages.10-2: Share your passions or current topics that matter to you in this section.

vous-etes-sur-le-point-denvoyer-un-mail-: You are about to send an email to the address
vous-etes-sur-le-point-de-supprimer-ce-m: You are about to delete this message
vous-etes-sur-le-point-de-publier-un-mes: You are about to post a message

person-lying-on-a-colorful-background-wi: Person lying on a colorful background with musical equipment, wearing headphones and sunglasses, holding a vinyl record and a vintage camera.
two-people-enjoying-music-together-weari: Two people enjoying music together, wearing headphones, and dancing while sitting on the floor.
young-woman-outdoors-smiling-and-listeni: Young woman outdoors, smiling and listening to music on her phone with headphones.
older-man-relaxing-on-a-couch-with-headp: Older man relaxing on a couch with headphones, playing an air guitar, and smiling.
two-people-sitting-together-smiling-and-: Two people sitting together, smiling and sharing a moment while listening to music on a mobile device with headphones.
family-with-parents-and-a-child-dancing-: Family with parents and a child dancing together in a living room.
older-couple-singing-together-with-the-m: Older couple singing together, with the man holding a microphone and the woman wearing headphones, both smiling.
blues-musician-playing-an-electric-guita: Blues musician playing an electric guitar on stage.
flamenco-dancer-performing-on-stage-with: Flamenco dancer performing on stage with guitarists in the background.
group-of-performers-in-traditional-moroc: Group of performers in traditional Moroccan attire performing Reggada dance on stage.
pansori-performance-with-a-singer-and-a-: Pansori performance with a singer and a drummer in traditional Korean attire on stage.
comment-est-ce-que-la-page-de-recherche-: How does the search page work?
la-page-de-recherche-vous-permet-de-filt: The search page allows you to filter by several criteria such as music format, genre, continent, language, and duration. You can also sort results by alphabetical order, release date, or reviews. You also have the option to display 9 songs per page or 3 songs per page.
vous-pouvez-acceder-a-vos-playlists-en-n: You can access your playlists by navigating to the 'My Playlists' section in the navigation bar. You can select the playlist of your choice and listen to the songs you want.
est-ce-que-mes-playlists-peuvent-fonctio: Do my playlists work on all browsers?
oui-nos-playlists-sont-concues-pour-fonc: Yes, our playlists are designed to work on all modern browsers. Make sure your browser is up to date for the best experience.
pour-faire-du-karaoke-naviguez-vers-la-s: To do karaoke, navigate to the 'Karaoke' section in the navigation bar. Once you click on 'Start Recording' and activate your microphone, you can record your performance while watching the lyrics. After clicking 'Stop Recording,' a new button will appear allowing you to listen to your recording and download it.
